SEARCH
Modul de.hitec.nhplus
Package de.hitec.nhplus.service

Klasse Session

java.lang.Object
de.hitec.nhplus.service.Session
public class Session extends Object
This class represents a session in the application. It uses the Singleton design pattern to ensure that only one session exists at any time. The session stores the caregiver who is currently logged in.

    • getInstance

      public static Session getInstance()
      This method returns the single instance of the Session class. If the instance does not exist, it is created.

    • logout
